headline: Is lululemon Athletica (LULU) Pricing Reflect Its Value After A 52% One Year Share Price Fall
summary: If you are wondering whether lululemon athletica's current share price really reflects what the business is worth, this article will walk you through the key valuation checks that investors tend to focus on. The stock last closed at US$178.11, with returns of 1% over the past week, a 6.8% decline over 30 days, a 15.5% decline year to date, and a 51.6% decline over the past year. These moves may have shifted how some investors view both its potential and its risks. Recent coverage has focused...

headline: A Look At Lululemon (LULU) Valuation As EMEA Store Count Reaches 100 And Expansion Widens
summary: Why the 100th EMEA store matters for lululemon athletica (LULU) lululemon athletica (LULU) is drawing fresh investor attention after announcing its 100th store in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, tied to a wider push into six new international markets. The milestone Warsaw opening in March, through a franchise partnership, introduces the brand to Poland and is part of a broader plan to add Hungary, Romania, Greece, India, and Austria to its footprint in 2026. For shareholders, the...
